summary: Normally the standing stone powers that can be activated are restricted to being cast once a day.  This mod changes the powers so they can be cast repeatedly without any sort of cooldown.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	  LFox No Standing Stone Power Cooldown v1.0
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the standing stone
powers.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

Normally the standing stone powers that can be activated are
restricted to being cast once a day.  This mod changes the
powers so they can be cast repeatedly without any sort of
cooldown.

The following standing stones are included.

The Ritual Stone
The Serpent Stone
The Shadow Stone

The Tower stone is not included because it is not actually a
power you can activate.  I think i might need the CK to modify
that one.

NOTE: Once again I might have used a cooldown for the powers but
I still don\'t know how to do that.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.0
- Made the plugin

*****************************************************************

     5. Contact Info

*****************************************************************

Direct all questions/comments to
hornedreapermjl@hotmail.com
author: LFox
